article_title: President Obama's Legacy And The Cancer Moonshot

article_metadata.description: With just less than nine months until the Obama family moves out of the White House, there's much chatter about the legacy the President will be leaving behind. To no one’s surprise, Republicans see very little in the plus column for the president. They cite an early exit from Iraq that [...]
article_metadata.author: Doug Schoen
